name: Peach Sangria

name: Strawberry Mojito
ingredients: lemon or lime juice, mint, lime, strawberries, sprite or seltzer and sugar
instructions: mash mint, lime wedges, strawberries and sugar if using seltzer, add 1 oz of lime or lemon juice, and top off with soda
